In England, in the seven days to 25 June, there were 83,880 new confirmed cases (148.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 June, there were 55,514 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 51% (28,366 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 June is 4,174,318 (7,381.6 cases per 100,000 population).
